creator: leslie.zhang@csiro.au
text:
We use Batik1.5 to view SVG files in a Java Applet.  If we move the mouse 
cursor on top of an element of the displayed SVG the tool tip come out without 
any problem unfortunately it does not go away after we move the mouse cursor 
away from the element.  The tool tip stayed on the screen after the SVG has 
been repainted. It just like a run away process or tread.  We tried to use 
Batik1.6 but it did not help.

Is this problem caused by Batik or is this caused by Java1.4?

Can anyone help?

creator: deweese@apache.org
text: This should be fixed in current CVS.
